page.title: 13PUBLIC HOUSES
page.content: The Plough is a good example of an {Old English public house}where beer, refreshments and food can be bought by residents and visitors. The surroundings are welcoming and have facilities for children.Plus the added attraction of a beautiful garden Best Bitter is the type of beer most popular in this area as it is the pubs speciality. People come from as far as Ashtead and Guildford for the{"Pub food".}Most trade is done at lunch time although people eat sometimes in the evening. There are many public houses in the area although some people prefer {working men's clubs.}Today public houses seem to be becoming more popular as aplace for the whole family.Many, like The Plough, welcome children, although they are not allowed to consume alcohol.
